categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: Raid on the Alliance to Restore the Republic

Sometime before the Dissolution of the Imperial Senate in 0 BBY, a member of the senatorial body pushed for the 181st Imperial Fighter Wing of the Galactic Empire's Imperial Starfighter Corps, to launch a raid on the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The mission ended up disastrous, with the unit losing at least two men, including Hedrian, the younger brother of fellow TIE fighter pilot Havina Vonreg. Although not killed by Alliance torpedos, Hedrian made it back to his hangar and passed away.

Vonreg held the senator accountable for her siblings' deaths just as much she did the rebels and alluded the raid to Shen. Around 4 ABY, the pilot mentioned the mission to another member of her own starfighter unit, Titan Squadron.
The raid was first mentioned in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons, developed by Motive Studios.
